caption.center: NEWTON WADE ROWLEY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. NANCY MARIE PARKER, DOUGLAS
CRYSTAL and KIM CRYSTAL, Defendants-Appellees, and RYAN PAUL HEIDORF

opinion.opinion_text:
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the April 20, 1999 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
Court of Appeals No. 206174.
